section.p: Disposition information provides an accounting for all subjects who entered the study and may include protocol milestones, such as randomization, as well as the subject's completion status or reason for discontinuation for the entire study or each phase or segment of the study, including screening and post-treatment follow-up.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A code drawn from a controlled terminology for the event or protocol milestone. The verbatim name for the term must be captured as well. [SDTM:DSTERM; DSDECOD]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
The start date/time of the disposition event. [SDTM: DSSTDTC]

SHALL contain [1..2] id
An identifier that is used to ensure the uniqueness of subject records within the substance use domain. [SDTM: DSSEQ, DSREFID] Note, the Sequence Number is required.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a category the disposition item is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] dispositionCategory with data type disposition Category

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the disposition item is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] dispositionSubCategory with data type disposition Sub Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Records the study epoch during which the information was collected.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to capture information, most particularly the timing, regarding the collection of data for an event. This is relevant especially in cases where the timing and duration of an event are distinct from that of data collection.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Data Collection (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.59)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to record the study days associated with the beginning and end points of an activity that may extend over a period of time.
